Package model

Class TodoModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.TodoModel
public class TodoModel
extends java.util.Observable
Author:
Kaushal Bhat, Mihir Yadav, Shreyas Khandekar, Zachary Florez Class that will hold the Model of ToDo Application.

  • Method Details

    • getTaskList

      public java.util.List<Task> getTaskList()
      Method to get a list of all the tasks that a user has.
      Returns:
      a list that contains all of the current tasks a user has.

    • getTaskListSize

      public int getTaskListSize()
      Method to get number of tasks a user is working with.
      Returns:
      number of current tasks.

    • addTask

      public void addTask​(Task task)
      Add a task to the TaskList
      Parameters:
      task - The task to be added

    • removeTask

      public boolean removeTask​(Task task)
      Removes the given task from the taskList in the model. If that task does not exist, it returns false and leaves the model unchaged
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be removed
      Returns:
      true if removed successfully, false otherwise

    • removeTask

      public Task removeTask​(java.util.Date dateCreated)
      Removes from the taskList the task given by the date it was created (which should be unique for each task). If such a task exists, it is returned after being removed; otherwise, taskList is unchanged and null is returned.
      Parameters:
      dateCreated - the date the task was created
      Returns:
      the Task deleted if list is changed; otherwise, null.

    • getTask

      public Task getTask​(java.util.Date dateCreated)
      Gets from the task list the task given by the date it was created. If such a task exists, it is returned. Otherwise, null is returned.
      Parameters:
      dateCreated - the dateCreated of the task to be removed.
      Returns:
      the Task if found; otherwise, null.

    • modifyTask

      public void modifyTask​(Task task, java.lang.String taskName, java.lang.String description, int priority, java.lang.String category, boolean completed, java.util.Date dateDue, java.lang.String location)
      Modifies a task given the task to be modified and all of its new values; values that should be kept the same should be passed in as the old value.
      Parameters:
      task - the task to be modified.
      taskName - the new name of the task.
      description - the new description of the task.
      priority - the new priority of the task.
      category - the new category of the task.
      completed - the new completeness of the task.
      dateDue - the new due date of the task.
      location - the new location of the task.

    • manualNotify

      public void manualNotify()
      Notifies the observers that the model has changed

    • updateShowCompleted

      public void updateShowCompleted​(boolean flag)
      Function to set flag for if we want to show completed tasks
      Parameters:
      flag - the flag that shows showCompleted status

    • saveList

      public void saveList​(java.io.ObjectOutputStream oos) throws java.io.IOException
      saves list by writing to object output stream
      Parameters:
      oos - thats been written into
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - throws exception if there was problem in I/O operation

    • getSaved

      public boolean getSaved()
      gets boolean of saved status
      Returns:
      boolean of save status

    • updateShowCategory

      public void updateShowCategory​(java.lang.String category, boolean flag)
      updates show category in tasklist
      Parameters:
      category - the category to be shown
      flag - the flag for show status
